snippet: The country introduced the limits to prevent a run in March 2013 when it received a multibillion-euro international rescue in a bid to halt a slide to bankruptcy.
abstract: Cyprus Pres Nicos Anastasiades announces that last remaining restrictions on transferring money abroad will be lifted, representing full restoration of confidence in country's banking sector.
lead_paragraph: The country introduced the limits to prevent a run in March 2013 when it received a multibillion-euro international rescue in a bid to halt a slide to bankruptcy.

headline.main: Cyprus’s Limits on Cash Transfers Abroad to End
headline.print_headline: Cyprus’s Limits on Cash Transfers Abroad to End
